content.en: Module detection: Scientists have developed various algorithms to detect and investigate functional modules in protein interaction networks. These algorithms, such as graph clustering, edge-betweenness, and weighted clustering coefficient, use network topology and high-throughput data to identify modules within biological networks. By applying these algorithms, researchers can better understand the modular organization of protein interaction networks and predict protein function.
content.da: Moduldetektion: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at detektere og undersøge funktionelle moduler i proteinnetværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom grafklyngedannelse, edge-betweenness og vægtet klyngekoefficient, anvender netværkstopologi og højhastighedsdata til at identificere moduler inden for biologiske netværk. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan forskere bedre forstå den modulære organisering af proteinnetværk og forudsige proteinfunktion.
